_header: Many man is loath to hear
_description: ‘A good steryng to heuenward’ — fifteen 14-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
Many man is loþ to hereRepref of vices & werkis
                    ylle…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…ffor þat leueþ þe byhendeþow mon rekene
                    or þe abyȝe
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 40-6.
